dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.path
Class XPathTransformer

java.lang.Object
  dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.path.AbstractPathTransformer
      dreisoft.tresos.datamodel2.api.model.path.XPathTransformer

public class XPathTransformer
extends AbstractPathTransformer

XPath specific implementation to do path transformations. A PathTransformer takes a match path and a replacement path like a regular expression engine. The match path is matched against a input path. If it matches the path is replaced by the replacement path. The replacement path may expand variables that take path fragments from the input path.

A match expression has the following form:

[ "/" ( <pathToken> | ( ( <literal>? "?" )+ <literal>? ) ]+

where "?" is a wildcard that matches all characters in a pathTokens and "/" is the path delimiter.

The token matching can be overloaded by reimplementing doMatch().

A replacement expression has the following form:

[ "/" <replacementToken> ]+

where replacementToken can contain variable references of the form "$" "{"? <varNo> "}"?. Variables are expanded by inserting the characters matched by literals of the match-string. Variable 0 matches the first wildcard, variables 1 the second and so on. The pathToken by which the variable is replaced can be patched by overloading the method doTransformVariableValue().
